item.title: Feature store
item.description: Feature store is an data system for managing and serving machine learning features to models in production. It is a tool for storing commonly used features.It consists of a centralized registry where we can publish features and serve ready-made features for production ML models. Functions of feature store: Transforms raw data into feature values by executing data pipelines. Stores and manages feature values. Retrieves data for training or inference.
